articles.title: MAC curtails basketball schedules, eliminates conference tournaments in other sports - ESPN
articles.description: In an effort to stem the financial fallout from the coronavirus pandemic, the Mid-American Conference announced Tuesday it would alter its men's and women's basketball schedules and eliminate conference tournaments in eight sports.
